result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.html: bhí hata ormI was wearing a hat.
result.ponchtml: ḃí hata ormI was wearing a hat.

result.eng: He boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ga: bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillí

result.html: bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ponchtml: ḃí brístí gearra ar na buaċaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.

result.eng: I love wearing high heavy boots.
result.ga: is breá liom buataisí arda troma a chaitheamh
